FuncDef:
The evpn-vpws ignore-ac-state command enables the function to ignore the attachment circuit (AC) status on an interface.
The undo evpn-vpws ignore-ac-state command disables the function to ignore the AC status on an interface.
By default, the function to ignore the attachment circuit (AC) status on an interface is disabled.
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
In a primary/secondary link networking scenario with EVPN VPWS deployed, if an AC interface enabled with the CFM and interface association function is down, the peer AC interface also becomes down and a primary/secondary link switchover is triggered. To ensure EVPN VPWS service continuity, run the evpn-vpws ignore-ac-state command on the AC interface to enable the function to ignore the AC status. After that, the EVPN VPWS service does not need to be re-established during a primary/secondary link switchover.
Prerequisites
An EVPL instance has been bound to the AC interface using the evpl instance command.
